abstract: Roberta Smith reviews solo show of paintings by Karen Heagle at the I-20 Gallery.
snippet: Karen Heagle’s third solo show blends symbolism, naturalism and illustration with sincerity and a subterranean sense of irony.
lead_paragraph: Karen Heagle’s third solo show blends symbolism, naturalism and illustration with sincerity and a subterranean sense of irony.

headline.main: Karen Heagle: ‘Let Nature Take Its Course and Hope It Passes’
headline.print_headline: Karen Heagle: ‘Let Nature Take Its Course and Hope It Passes’
headline.seo: KAREN HEAGLE: ‘Let Nature Take Its Course and Hope It Passes’
